original_text: Sometimes the cloud was a few days over the tabernacle, and according to the command of the Lord they remained in camp; then according to the command of the Lord they set out.
korean_text: 혹시 구름이 성막 위에 머무는 날이 적을 때에도 그들이 다만 여호와의 명령을 따라 진영에 머물고 여호와의 명령을 따라 행진하였으며

sentences.original_text: Sometimes the cloud was a few days over the tabernacle
sentences.korean_translation: 때로는 구름이 며칠 동안 성막 위에 머물렀고

sentences.original_text: and according to the command of the Lord
then according to the command of the Lord
